reviewText:
Nunca sucede nada.  Es como la obra "Esperando a Godot".

For the Amazon review checkers who are illiterate in languages other than and insist that reviews of Spanish or Portuguese language films be in English, here is the English translation of what I wrote: Nothing happens.  It is like the play "Waiting for Godot".
Decent story w good subtitles if you are trying to learn spanish. Finally a mexican movie thats not depressing. Yeah.

Esta es una pelcula acerca de dos amigos, uno que la otra mujer, ella quiere un trabajo y que quiere una mujer. Ella se compromete a ayudar a encontrar una esposa si le ayuda a encontrar un trabajo. Qu es el genio cmico persues puro todo el camino hasta el final sorpresa.

I was looking for some comedy- romantic drama free movies and I came across this.
It arrived on time, no scratches and well packed.
This is a great film, for everyone who understands the meaning between friendship and love. A good movie for a young couple
